name: Skyraine (itch)
description:
Skyraine is an action-packed platform defender game. Fight off enemies in your turret and collect supplies to build your base. Use power-ups and set up defenses to hold off waves of unique enemies. Play with up to 3 players in local multiplayer, and face 4 exponentially challenging difficulties. Can you survive?

Version 1.3:

Fixed bug where you could fly off of a ladder and die. Also, the $500 reward for defeating brutal is no longer available, but stay tuned for upcoming rewards!

Now added: Skyraine unlocked! With this version you can save and restore your progress in a game in order to defeat the more challenging levels.
